Detailed Description

Allows accessing the configuration for Zi8. This configuration file is mandatory for APOXI. The header file may not be changed or extended in any manner, it is only allowed to customize the implementation of the methods. If additional methods are needed for the MMI it is required to create a custom configuration file.
